lead_paragraph: HURLOCK--James Bickford. NewYork-Presbyterian mourns the death of our esteemed Life Trustee James Bickford Hurlock, Esq. Elected a Trustee of The Presbyterian Hospital in the City of New York in 1986, Mr. Hurlock served Presbyterian Hospital and later NewYork- Presbyterian Hospital for thirty years. Mr. Hurlock was an active Trustee who chaired or served on numerous Hospital and Medical Center committees. A brilliant lawyer with the highest standards of excellence, Mr. Hurlock contributed his legal expertise and business acumen for the benefit of the Hospital. NewYork-Presbyterian is very fortunate that during his busy and accomplished life, Mr. Hurlock was a devoted and wise steward of our institution. We will miss him. We extend our deepest sympathies to Mr. Hurlock's wife, Lyn, his sons James, Burton and Matthew, and the entire Hurlock family. Frank A. Bennack, Jr., Chairman, Board of Trustees Steven J. Corwin, M.D., President and CEO NewYork-Presbyterian 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HURLOCK, JAMES BICKFORD
